page.title: 03Industry _ Dunnington
page.content: {Electricity Supply} With the increased demand for electricity the National Distribution Grid was established.A sub-station was built next to the Hull Road. Electricity is distributed by the way of the N.E.E.B. to 102,000 domestic and industrial consumers. {Murton Industrial Estate}first developed by the old station but now only the Scrap Processors are by the former track. Other firms include:- two firms of engineers _ mechanical and car body repairs, supplier of animal feedstuff, dairy distribution depot, fruit & vegetable merchant & packer. { Dunnington Industrial Estate,}near the old railway line, consists of a grain drier, suppliers of agri- cultural fertilizers & of veterinary drugs.
